name: Nukumori no Naka de: In the Warmth
overview: Nukumori no Nakade in the Warmth is an adventure game that put the player in the role Atsushi Kanda a student that joins the high school club in which is also Mina Shimbashi, she got a sister that is also member of the club. The club make different activities like excursions or athletic ones. During the game the player will meet other members of the club (male and female ones) all of them with a japanese voice acting. The goal of the game is to make choices that will leave the story in different directions and the player can also choose in some parts where he wants to go around the town. There are different events and at the end of the summer there will be the Summer cultural festival and something will happen there. The game uses a first person perspective with 2d graphics, and features a Jukebox and a CG Gallery of the game characters.
